text: Ibu Mertuaku () is a 1962 black-and-white melodrama film from Singapore. It was directed by and stars famous actor P. Ramlee. The story is about the sad love affair between Kassim Selamat, a poor musician, and Sabariah, the daughter of a rich woman. ==Related pages== * P. Ramlee filmography Category:1962 movies Category:Singaporean movies Category:Black-and-white movies
title: Ibu Mertuaku
